name: After Life - Story of a Father DEMO
name_original: After Life - Story of a Father DEMO
description:
After Life is an interactive narrative game. You assume the role of Rick Dennehy, a family man who died during the 90's, as he explores his life's events through the memories of his loved ones.

Set in Ireland, After Life takes you through Ricks life and the time around his death. The story revolves strongly around life and death as Rick discovers what his family and friends thought of him and how they saw Rick while he was still alive. It's developed by a one man team, it features a full soundtrack composed by an Irish composer Neal Bond and most voice acting is done by native speakers.

The full version is available in Steam: http://store.steampowered.com//app/550240
